1.content: what will this story be about
1.title: whats going on

choices: A boy shrinks his hot mom
All women in the world shrink
An old man finds a shrink ray
11.content: What kind of shrinking story shall it be?
11.title: A Shrinking Adventure

111.content:
Charles is a hard working businessman. His wife left him to raise their daughter alone.

He was 46 years old, balding, had a bit of a beer gut and was very lonely.

His daughter was the only thing that made him truly happy.

Charles won a sweepstakes at work and found himself in possession of a shrink ray.

“Man, my daughter sure would be cute as a doll. I’ll shrink her when I get home!”

So as soon as the day was done Charles drove home and then happily walked in to his house ready to shrink his daughter

How old is his daughter?
111.title: Dad shrinks his young daughter

1111.content:
Charles was ready. He had his shrink ray in hand and went to the house.

His daughter Megan saw him enter the door and was immediately thrilled.

“Daddy!!!” She ran up to him and gave him a massive hug.

“Hi, sweetheart did you miss me?”

His precious daughter with her raven hair and blue eyes just smiled at him and gave him a kiss on the cheek.

“Sweetie, I’ve got a surprise for you!”

“What is it??” She asked excited.

Charles pulled out his shrink ray.

“What is it?” Megan said with interest.

“Close your eyes” he said

His daughter obeyed

“Here we go!” Charles said with glee. He pressed the button and a yellow light engulfed his ten year old daughter holding it on her until he got her as small as he wanted. When he stopped, he looked down at saw that his daughter Megan was now only five inches tall on the floor.

“It worked!” He exclaimed

Meanwhile Megan suddenly looked up to see her dad the size of a skyscraper. She knew she had become tiny

How did Megan feel?
1111.title: Mini Daughter

choices: Charles takes Megan to the beach
11111.content:
“Daddy!!” Megan waved up with excitement. “Down here! I’m tiny”

Charles was so excited. His shrinking worked.

“Hold on jelly bean, let daddy pick you up.”

The ten year old girl excitedly ran to her dads giant hand and hugged his thumb.

“Ha ha, Dad you’re so big.”

“Actually Megan, I shrunk you. I always knew my little girl was the cutest and I wanted to make you even cuter and it looks like I succeeded because I could just eat you up.”

He jokingly opened his mouth and fake chomped making Megan laugh so hard she fell on her butt.

“Thanks for shrinking me daddy!” She blew a big kiss to him to which he responded by kissing her little head and lightly brushing her long dark beautiful hair.

“I love you so much my beautiful little girl.” He loved Megan with all his being and now that she was the perfect size, Charles could love his babygirl exactly how he wanted.”

What happens next?
11111.title: Happy to be Shrunk

choices: Megan wants to explore around with her dad.
111111.content:
Charles was happy knowing his daughter agreed to all of this, however, he had some bad news. "Megan, honey, I need to tell you something."

"What is it, dad?" The small girl asked, looking around the room and surprised at how big it was.

"Well, to make it simple, it looks like dad will no longer have a job." But Megan didn't understand what he meant.

He explains. "The company, in which I work, is going to bankruptcy next week, and since we're working with experimental machinery, they offered a sweepstake with all the inventions they had." He grabs the shrink ray. "Just like this one." Megan seems nervous.

"Don't worry, sweetie." Charles pats her head. "I saved enough money to last for a couple of months." He assured. "But for now we are selling a lot of the stuff we own."

"That's okay." Megan said. "As long as I'm with you, dad, we can be happy." She hugs his thumb again, then an idea pops into her head. "I know, how about you sell all of my clothes?, it's not like they fit me anymore."

"You're right, not only you are cute but also smart." He kisses her cheek and Megan giggles.

She raises her arms and waits. "What are you doing?" Charles asks.

"I told you I don't need clothes anymore." she says. "Take these ones too."

Charles thought it wasn't necessary, but Megan looked so cheerful that he couldn't reject her.

"Fine." Charles said, he moves his hand closer to his face to verify he wouldn't hurt Megan. He used his free hand to pull her blouse, revealing her flat chest to him.

Next, he used two fingers to pull her pants down, underwear included, rubbing them against her thighs.

"Now you do the rest." Charles instructed his daughter.

Megan nodded and stepped out of her pants and removed her socks, finishing the undressing.

"Okay, little girl." Charles said. "Since you already gave away too much, what do you want to do?"
111111.title: Charles undresses Megan

choices: To the neighbors to say hi
1111111.content:
"I wanna go outside!" Megan said "I wanna see what its like." The tiny naked girl jumped up and down repeatedly with excited.

"Okay sweetie, we can go outside and explore." Charles said to his diminutive daughter.

"Yay! Thanks daddy!" She hugged his thumb again and gave it a sweet kiss.

Charles walked outside with his shrunken ten year old daughter in the palm of his hand. As the door opened the sun shined down on them, with Megan's blue eyes wide open at the gorgeousness of her new gigantic world.

"Wow. Everything is so big outside!" Megan said feeling the warmth of the sun on her nude body. Charles looked down at his daughter, and couldn't help but notice how cute she was. He did say he wanted to make her even cuter and he did just that.

As Charles walked with little Megan in his palm, he looked around at all of the different things from the flowers in the garden to the little bird bath to the long green grass on the lawn. All of these things could be an adventure for his tiny girl and he was very excited to see what he could do with her at her size.

"All right, Megan, where do you wanna explore my little cutie?"

Megan looked around and said she knew where she wanted to go.
1111111.title: New World Outside

choices: She climbed down and was drying herself. (Go back inside the house with her.)
He noticed two kids running away from his garden.
11111111.content:
"To the bird bath." Megan said. "I want to take a bath."

Charles nodded and with a few steps, he takes his daughter to her destination.

He lowers his hand. "Okay, here we are, enjoy your bath, my little lady." He acts as a butler.

"Thanks, Charles, you are free to go." Megan also pretends to be a rich girl and giggles. "I love you, dad."

"I love you, too, Megan." He replied, Charles could see his naked daughter enjoying this bird bath as if she was standing in a lake and thought that she was beautiful. Knowing that she would like to enjoy more time in there, he decides to water the garden and moves to grab a hose. Charles was glad that Megan was willing to stay in her current size.

"It will be difficult to explain this to the neighbors and to her school." Charles thought. "I guess I need to talk with her."

However, as Charles turns around, Megan was no longer in the bird bath. Scared, he runs to see where she was...
11111111.title: To the Bird Bath

111111112.content: As charles was heading to megans location he saw two lads running away from the _____ out of his garden
111111112.title: He noticed two kids running away from his garden.

choices: he dresses her in cute little outfits
he takes her on a date
11112.content:
The poor nine year old girl was terrified. Everything had become huge. Her loving father was now the size of a building to her.

The little girl looked up and screamed at the sight of her massive daddy.

Charles was excited that his shrinking worked but then stopped when he saw his daughter was so scared.

"Don't worry Megan, I won't hurt you."

He reached down his hand but Megan actually tried to run away screaming until she was caught in her papa's hand.

Charles brought his daughter to his face. She was as cute as a button. Everything he loved about his daughter but everything was pocket sized. He smiled at his handywork.

"It's ok sweet pea, Daddy's got you."

'Daddy I don't like being small, please make me big again." Charles felt guilty as his cute baby girl started to shake and show fear. It was such a big world she was living in.

"I... I don't know how sweetie, I just could only think about shrinking you."

This was a lie, he knew how to bring her back to size but he didn't want to. Megan was now his to enjoy and love and play with how he saw fit.

What does Charles do now with his scared teeny ten year old daughter?
11112.title: Tiny and Terrified

choices: "Let's see what your Uncle Joe thinks"
111122.content:
"You know what, Megan?" Charles said to his daughter. "We're gonna have some fun with your size. Let's go."

Charles carried the teeny ten year old girl in his hand over to his bedroom. Megan looked up nervous at her dad being so much bigger than her, he tried giving her a comforting smile, and she shyly and nervously reciprocated.

When they go to the room, Charles set Megan on his work desk.

"Stay put sweetie. Daddy needs a couple of things." Her father ducked under the desk and pulled out both a magnifying glass and what looked like a tiny jewelry box. He opened up the little box and revealed a large assortment of little doll outfits for five inches tall dolls. "Tah dah. What do you think, Megan?"

The young Megan curiously walked over to the giant jewelry box and admired the variety of different outfits for a doll or a person her size.

"Hold still princess." He lightly picked her up with his massive fingers being carefully not to crush her little head. He loved how easy she was to pick up. With gentle care, he lightly tugged at Megan's white shirt and pulled it over her head revealing her bare chest to him. He tossed it aside, only casually taking a glance at the girl's cute nipples. He then turned his attention to her soft long black pants, and slid those off leaving her only in a white pair of panties. Megan felt awkward wearing so little at her size. He set the mostly nude girl onto the desk and pulled out a little blue dress like Alice from Alice in Wonderland. He put it on his little girl and admired how pretty she looked. He put the magnifying glass over her as she walked around nervous. She did like the dress.

"Give me a twirl sweetie." Charles said. Megan obeyed doing a graceful little spin in her light blue dress. He went through the process again with several different outfits. The process was the same, Charles would gently remove his daughter's current outfit and lightly replace it with another cute one. He would then have her walk around and model as he eyed her with his magnifying glass. The assortments included a cowgirl outfit, a green tinkerbell outfit, a pink princess dress, a soccer uniform with a green jersey and black shorts, and a little white wedding dress. Each one made Charles swoon. He loved watching his ten year old dolly try on these cute little outfits.
"She is the cutest thing on the planet." He picked up Megan as she was wearing her wedding dress and lifted the veil over her head while humming Here Comes the Bride, which made Megan giggle.

"Don't you like your outfits, Megan?"

"I do, Dad" Megan said after a small shy smile.

"They look very cute." Charles said teasingly to his five inch daughter. Megan felt this was a little strange but tried to be open minded, she was still having a hard time adjusting to only being five inches tall.

Charles couldn't get enough of putting Megan in different little outfits. She was his to play with and he was loving every minute of it.

What does Charles say next?
111122.title: Dress up with Daughter

choices: I called some of your friends from school ."
1111222.content:
"What!?" Megan exclaimed.

"Yes, Megan. I think we are done with those outfits." Charles comments. "Now, I need to wash your clothes."

"No, dad. I don't want to." The little girl responds, crossing her arms.

"What's the problem? There's nothing wrong with a father seeing his daughter naked."

Megan thought that his dad had a point. "I guess." She says.

"Then, hurry up. I need to make sure that you don't have an allergy to the fabric of the dresses." Charles explains.

The little girl takes off the dress and stands, trying not to cover her bare chest.

"Perfect, now I need your underwear."

Megan sighed, pulling down her white panties. "That's all that I have." Annoyed, the girl turns around.

"Don't be like that, sweetie. I think you look cute."

Megan blushed a little, but she was still mad at her father for being shrunk. Suddenly, someone knocks on their main door.

"What was that?" Megan asked.

Charles smiled. "Oh, I thought that you would like a surprise, so....
1111222.title: "Let's see you without any clothes"

1113.content: Maybe these ages for his daughter?
1113.title: Other Daughter Ages

112.content: How old is our Oedipal protagonist going to be?
112.title: A boy shrinks his hot mom

choices: She shrinks to six inches tall
She shrinks down to 5 foot 2 (losing 5 inches)
1121.content:
Nicholas and Pauline were as close as a mother and son could be. Nicholas was a 10 year old boy, and Pauline was his 35 year old mother

Pauline raised Nicholas on her own after she got knocked up by her ex boyfriend, but she had been able to support them fairly well during her time as a secretary.

Pauline was gorgeous and athletic. She had an athletic figure with a nice pair of boobs, long black hair often tied in a pony tail and a big wide butt, that Nicholas would sometimes use as a pillow in his toddler days.

Pauline unfortunately had a new job and she was going to have to go on a business trip.

"I'm sorry Nicky, but I have to go. I'll be back in a week. You're Aunt Lisa will take care of you."

"It's not fair Mom, I want you to stay here with me." He wrapped his arms around her in a hug.

"Aww Sweetie, I know but sometimes adults need to travel for work."

"Well I don't like it, I wish you could stay with me." Soon a weird bolt of lightning struck outside that surprised them both.

"Why don't you get ready for bed, sweetie, I'll tuck you in later."

Pauline tucked her son in, put on her bright red pajamas and went straight to bed. Little did Pauline know but there was a very scary surprise awaiting her when she woke up.

(What happens to Pauline when she sleeps?)
1121.title: A Boy and His Mommy

choices: Good morning mommy (unaware slow shrinking, only Pauline and Nicholas knows)
Good morning mommy (unaware slow shrinking, only Pauline knows)
11212.content:
That night when mother and son go to their respective rooms, after that thunder of earlier, Nicholas, the ten year old boy, with short black hair and brown eyes, decide in his bedroom to put on his blue pajamas, he feel so bad right now that he don't even want see his tv show as he go on the bed, and lie his head in his pillow, Nicholas was so sad right now, he really want to stay with his mom, he really don't want her to go to that bussines trip, wishing for some way to stop that to happen as some tears flow to his cheeks while he fall sleep with the sound of the rain in the night.

Meanwhile, Pauline was on her bed with the light of her lamp on as she read a book, thinking in her son's words, it really hurt her heart to see him suffer in that way, Pauline give her love to Nicholas as much as she can, after all he was her only son, the only person that she cares about, Pauline want to protect him at any cost and be at his side all the time, but life don't work in that way. After a week she has to go on a business trip, and tomorrow she has to go to the market and buy some things, she then decide to spend this last days with her son as much as she can, at least, is the best that she can do for her son right now.

Then Pauline yawn, it was her sign for go to sleep already, so she put her book on the table a side of her bed, and turn off the lamp and lie her head on the pillow while hearing the sound of the rain giving her a peaceful sleep.

The next morning, the sun rises with glory after the raining night of yesterday, it was around the 7:00 am, Pauline was waking up at this moment, yawning tired as she stand off her bed, she was going to her bathroom while she scratch her head with her long hair, all messy, nothing that she can't fix later of course, Pauline then feel her red pajamas a little loose but she don't pay much atention to this, after she used her toilet and brush her teeth, she change her clothes, wearing her casual sky blue top and a long green light skirt, as she put her pink furry slippers and fix her long hair making her usual pony tail, she then feel her clothes a little baggy.

"Oh my, is this continues, i will have to stop my exercise routine, or nothing will fit me" said Pauline giggling about it, thinking that she has lose too much weight.

Later, Pauline go to the kitchen to prepared the breakfast, making coffe and preparing everything to make her son's favorites pancakes, but then, when Pauline has to go to the kitchen cupboard to grab the flour, as she open it, Pauilne has to stand on tiptoe to reach and grab the flour, it was weird, usually she don't have this kind of problems when she do this, but those thought dissapear when she hear her son yawning as he come closer to the kitchen, she smile and turn back to Nicholas.

"Good morning baby, do you have sleep well?" said Pauline welcoming her son, Nicholas was still wearing his blue pajamas and was rubbing his right eye.


(Note from the author: Usually i'm making shorts beginings, then will come the 5k, 6k and even 7k words per chapter jejeje, anyway, if you like this chapter you can let me know by send me a email, i hope that the chapter is ok)
11212.title: A nice morning

choices: Josh didn't notice his mom shrink (unaware)
An angry Josh is suddenly in charge. (Aware)
Cockroach Tessa, shrinking wasn't the only change. (Unaware/aware)
1122.content:
"You haven't cleaned your room, you failed your math test, and you aren't showing me any respect! Why the hell would you even ask to have friends over ?" Tessa asked her 14 year old son Josh. She was over his attitude, and refused to give him what he wanted.

"Why are you being so unfair?" Josh screamed in rage.

Josh's father, and step mother spoiled him endlessly. So much so that Tessa was unable to get him to listen to her at all. It was always a fight over the most simple of tasks.

"I'm not unfair!" Tessa bit back. "It is not too much to ask that you keep up with your chores while you're here!"

Looking around Josh's filthy room Tessa scrunched her nose. "This room is disgusting, it smells horrible, and I wouldn't be surprised if there are bugs."

Josh just rolled his eyes. "You just care about how you look in front of all your friends. You'd die if any of them saw one tiny bug running around."

Tessa rubbed her temples. "That's not the point. It's about respect, and you obviously don't have any idea what that is." She turned to leave. "Now clean your room, or else you lose your phone."

Josh's face was turning red with anger. "You have no right to take my phone! Anne gave me that phone!" He screamed.

Tessa had heard enough. She hated have Anne's name thrown in her face constantly. "I don't care Josh. You're in my house, I am your mother, and you will do what I tell you to! Do you understand?" By time she had finished she was screaming.

Josh backed away from his furious mother, and sat down on the edge of his bed. He appeared defeated, and possibly hurt. Tessa had a moment of concern, but knew she had to stay firm. She turned to leave the teenager's room, hoping he would take her words seriously.

"I hate you." Josh muttered under his breath. "I wish you would just disappear. I wish I was in charge!"

Tessa heard his hurtful words, but tried to ignore them. Unfortunately his words carried unknown power. An angry energy washed over Tessa's body. She felt her body began to dwindle down.

Before she could even begin to understand what was happening Tessa, and her clothes shrank to barely a quarter of an inch.

choices: Mom's rules are clear. Bugs are squished.
Josh decides to toy with Tessa longer.
11223.content:
In shock Tessa slowly turned to see if Josh had seen her shrink. Her body felt strange as she moved. To her horror Tessa realized she had not only shrank, but was in fact a cockroach.

Six multi jointed legs rotated Tessa's new long slender body. Her eyes still seemed to be able to see as well as before. Unfortunately what she saw was her son looking towards her.

"Mom ?" He asked unsure, and in as much shock as Tessa.

"Josh! It's me!" Tessa screamed, but only insect noises escaped her new mandibles.

Her heart raced out of control as Josh pushed to his feet. His giant form dominated her vision as he moved towards her. His bare feet causing ominous booms with each step on the carpeted floor.

Tessa looked up at her son, terrified to move. His presence was so overwhelming to the bug woman. She hated to admit it, but she was scared for her life.

"This isn't real." Josh said staring down at the roach. "There's just no way that you're mom. You're just a roach. Right ?"

"It's me! It's me! Please help!" Tessa begged, but Josh was unable to hear her true voice.

Josh knelt down, causing Tessa to scurry away backwards. Her survival instincts told her to keep running, but she stopped instead.

Josh reached out with his right hand, laying it palm up on the ground in front of Tessa. "God, I must be crazy." He said under his breath. "If you're mom, crawl onto my hand."

Tessa moved forward quickly. She was surprised at how smoothly her new body traversed the carpet fibers. Reaching Josh's fingers she used her six tiny legs to easily climb up onto his palm.

There was silence for a few moments as Josh finally accepted that his mom was no a roach.

Finally he spoke. "I can't believe you're a roach. This is so weird!" He said, his voice beginning to fill with excitement.

"Yes, it's me! Call your Aunt Rose!" Tessa screamed up at her giant son.

"I think I did this." Josh said outloud. "I wanted to be in charge." A slight grin forming at the corners of his lips.

Tessa was feeling uneasy in her son's giant palm. She unconsciously began to back away.

"I guess I am now. It's not like you can actually tell me what to do now." Josh said matter-of-factly.

"Josh! This is serious! Get help!" Tessa screamed, in frustration and fear.

Josh laughed loudly. "I bet you're yelling at me right now." He said smugly. "A roach is yelling at me. I can't believe it."

Tessa was equally scared, and angry at how immature Josh was behaving. For her this was the most serious situation possible. For him it was a joke. "Josh, I'm not a roach! I'm your mother!" She hissed.

Almost as of he understood her Josh replied to her tiny hiss. "Because you know, you're not my mom now. You're just a bug." Josh callously turned his hand over, dumping Tessa back to the floor.

Tessa screamed as her tiny body fell unceremoniously onto the floor. She landed with little impact. Her body had far too little mass to fall with any force.

"Mom would be so upset that there was a bug in her house!" Josh said mockingly. "Should I do what she would want, and squish it." He lifted his foot threateningly. "Or should I just let the little bug fend for itself ?"
11223.title: Cockroach Tessa, shrinking wasn't the only ...

112231.content:
Josh's foot slammed down with force, directly where Tessa had landed. Tessa thankfully had already moved out of the way. She was in shock at both her son's callous attempt on her life, and her lightning reflexes.

The tiny roach woman zigged back and forth as she ran between Josh's feet. Her survival instincts were running at full speed. Tessa knew if she could get under Josh's bed she would be safe.

Josh saw where she was headed and moved to block her. He took two quick strides and dropped his foot in Tessa's path.

Undeterred Tessa sped up and attempted to go straight over Josh's foot. Her six tiny legs allowed her to effortlessly climb his flesh as walk on the floor.

Josh lurched at the feeling of insect legs on his foot. The motion sent Tessa flying onto his unmade bed.

As quickly as she could Tessa was back on her feet. She bolted across the bed towards the wall. Josh was on her quickly. His hands slamming down onto the bunched up blanket.

Tessa was suddenly pressed between Josh's palm and the soft blanket. Her roach body flattened but it seemed almost natural. Josh lifted his hand not realizing he hadn't squished his mother.

Using this to her advantage Tessa quickly raised across the bed. Josh was unprepared to attack again. Triumphant Tessa dropped down between the bed and the wall.

She heard Josh stomp off in a rage. She didn't know what her next move would be, but she knew she had to avoid her 14 year old son. It pained her to know that if he found her again he wouldn't hesitate to kill her.
112231.title: Mom's rules are clear. Bugs are squished.

1122311.content:
Feeling relatively safe in her hiding spot Tessa didn't bother to move when she heard Josh return. She felt the bed creak under her son's weight.

"Gotcha now" Josh said as he aimed a can of Raid between his bed and the wall.

Tessa saw the can too late to react. As he pressed the nozzle burning liquid rained from the sky. Its touch burned Tessa's hard carapace body. She screamed and tried to run away.

With the burning liquid seemingly soaking into her body Tessa ran under the bed. Her vision was greatly reduced. Without realizing it she ran back into the open.

Josh was there waiting with another shot of the spray. Her body twitched violently out of her control.

With a smug grin Josh watched the roach flailing around in pain. He stepped forward and put an end to the torture with a powerful stomp.

He felt the roach's body explode under the ball of his foot. With a twist he drug his foot backward smearing the remains along the carpet.

"Rules are rules. Mom said, no bugs." Josh said with an accomplished tone.
1122311.title: Josh returns with bug spray.

choices: She raised her hand and asked to go to the restroom.
She held her bottom closed as she waited until recess.
12113222.content:
She might not have been late for class, but now she was late for the bathroom. She sat down in the slightly cold classroom with her bubbly tummy, sliding into her seat at the desk with the rest of the kids. It wasn't long before she was bouncing side to side in her seat, just dying for a restroom. The day began normally enough, not very much going on work wise, and the other kids were starting to talk with each other. She stayed still in her chair as long as she could before she started feeling a bit more funny. No matter what was going on in the classroom, the only thing she could think of now was going number two, and fast.

It was somewhat early in the day before she decided to ask for the restroom. She tried waiting for just the right moment to raise her hand, not only to be noticed by the teacher, but maybe during a time that her stomach didn't hurt so much. She thought and thought, tried keeping her mind off her business, but it was rather difficult. She looked up and tried paying attention to class right when she felt a sudden feeling, jumping at attention to get it to stop. What was that? She adjusted herself in her seat to realize it was just as she thought--She might have gone just a little in her panties too early. It sure felt like it as she contniually re-adjusted her seat, trying to get the scent to stop. The other kids certainly noticed something in the air, but not quite able to put their finger on it. Luckily, it wasn't too bad. But it was just about to get worse.

Her stomach rumbled as she had to make a decision. The teacher seems like they're in the middle of a lesson, but it kind of looks like you may be able to hold it until recess.
12113222.title: Girl in fourth grade has to go number two

choices: Make up a story to get me to the front of the line
Go outside and find a bush
1213.content:
"Don't think about it, don't think about it, don't think about it," I chanted as I as crossed and uncrossed my legs while rocking back and forth.

Hi, my name is Danielle and yes I was a 16 year old doing the potty dance. But really it was just unfair. Why is it that the girls restroom line is always long, but the boys is not existent. I was currently at the mall on my way to a job interview. My first job interview to be exact. I planned on being the newest team member at Mix it up, a local yogurt shop. The only thing standing in my way was the fact that I was nervous and really had to go. Okay so the truth is I have a nervous bladder. There is no way I could make it through an interview without emptying my bladder. Unfortunately by the look of this line I would be late to my interview

Nope that could not happen. I had too many plans for the money from this job. Plus having a job is a necessity for my future college applications. I was making it to the toilet. One way or another. The way I see it there was only one viable option:

choices: She tried again and there, just out of her reach, was what she was looking for
There was no way she could reach them
15.content:
She had super-powers. Not only did life suck but it had turned into a cross between an episode of the "Big Bang Theory" and Superman - the characters sourced exclusively from the Big Bang the situation based on Superman. A month ago she had been an economics student at Oxford University and today she was sitting on a roof surrounded by an elf, a gargoyle and a nerd (though that appellation might have applied to the non-human members of her team as well) trying to control a full out mob - WITH HER MIND. Could life get any stranger?

"Come on, Janna. You are Spock without the touching! Mind meld already!"

She loved Charlie, her childhood friend, her confidante - but at the moment she would have cheerfully thrown him off the roof. Mind meld? Spock? God, how did he come up with these things? And the fact that Xkaltr, gargoyle by race and curious by nature, jumped onto the incomprehensible Star Trek reference like a starving bear on a salmon run, dissecting and questioning the comment, did not help her concentration. The rain was cold, the voices around her began to mirror the angry shouts of the crowd below her and if she did not manage to calm down that mob soon there would be more than property damage. The low levels of terror in her gut, a constant companion of the last few weeks, was quickly blooming into all out panic.

A strong arm came around her middle, pulling her against a warm form. Sheltered against the rain by Geriel's body it was easier to breathe.

"Concentrate, Janna. You can feel their emotions, that means you can also influence them. Ignore everything else. Ignore the voices, ignore the cold - just feel them."

She tried. She really tried. She let her mind clear, let it empty and reach. It was hard. She was battered by all the anger and frustration, the fear and violence experienced by everyone below. But for a moment, just a moment, she thought she could feel the sliver of awareness to grasp, to influence ....
15.title: super-powers

choices: Xkaltr and Charlie come and all of them go to Geledriel's home
Something attacks both of them and Geledriel defends
151.content:
Everything was confusing, there was no distinction and she could actually see the emotions, in their physical form. It was in different colours. Geriel had said that each person with the same ability as hers would perceive and see in their own different way. She hadn't expected this but it wasn't a bad thing.

Her heart beat had started running a thousand miles per second as she looked around. She could see the people around her, Geriel, Charlie and Xkaltr but above their heads was a cloud, different coloured showing the emotion they were feeling. She saw that Xkaltr and Charlie had started arguing about the star trek reference Charlie had used and there was a purple cloud on top of both their heads. She eased herself inside Geriel's embrace and turned around to look at him.

There was a cloud above his head too, it was not a single colour, it was a mixture of red and pink. A beautiful blend. She raised her hand to touch the cloud. Since Geriel couldn't know what she was going to touch, his shoulders tensed, wondering what Janna might be doing. His tensed shoulders and expression soon changed into one of a confused when he saw Janna waving and tapping her hand over his head.

"Janna?"

As soon as Janna had touched the cloud over his head, the cloud colour changed to yellow. She turned her head upwards and saw hers was yellow too.

"I have no idea what you did but I feel curious and intrigued even though there is nothing new here. . ., " Geriel said as his eyebrows came together and he looked at Janna, confused why he was feeling the way he was. Something must have clicked in his mind because his eyes opened wide and he smiled.

"You did it, Janna. You influenced by emotions. You felt curious and when you touched me, the same emotion transferred into me. How about you go to the two idiots over there and try to calm them, pacify them without touching, hmm? Let's see how much you have progressed."

Janna wasn't sure what Geriel was talking about but upon hearing Charlie's and Xkaltr's voices, she turned her head towards their direction and walked. She looked back at Geledriel and the cloud had changed its colour back to violet and pink shade as Geledriel looked at her, his eyes devoid of any emotions but there was something else. She didn't know what but she was sure there was something. She just couldn't point it out. Geledriel signalled her to continue towards Charlie and Xkaltr and so she did.

She went near them.

"Clear your mind." She heard Geledriel's voice. She turned around and was shocked.

"Clear your mind and concentrate, you can do this," she heard his voice again but she was looking right at him and his lips weren't moving, not a bit. They were talking through telepathy.

Geledriel's gaze bore into hers and for some stupid reason, she blushed and quickly turned around towards Charlie and Xkaltr. She cleared her throat and then thought of wishing that they had stopped fighting. She imagined that she was touching the clouds above their heads. Suddenly, the noise stopped and she opened her eyes to see both Charlie and Xkaltr staring at her, dumbfounded and confused.

The clouds above their heads had changed its colour to one of a blue - ish, white. She heard footsteps come close and someone pat her on her head.

She looked around to see Geledriel, smiling, pleased with whatever she had done. She closed her eyes again and thought of getting out of this version of the world where she could see the emotions and when she opened her eyes a little later, the clouds had disappeared.

"Get something to eat, Xkaltr and Charlie, fetch her some boiled water with lemon grass leaves, mint, honey and cidar," Geledriel instructed and both of them, though grumbling, went away to get the stuff they were asked to get and come back.

Janna suddenly felt her vision blur and her knees lose strength, she lost her balance and just as she was about to fall on the group, strong arms gripped her and balanced her.

"Easy," Geledriel helped Janna get near a wall and then had Janna lean against the wall to sit. He took a spot next to her and just looked at her.

"Thanks, I guess," Janna smiled weakly as she gazed in Geledriel's green eyes, "You said that everyone saw emotions differently right? Well, I saw them as differently coloured clouds above everyone's heads."

"Oh, so that was what you were doing," he nodded his head.

"So far, I have understood that yellow is for curiosity, white and bluish are for calmness and purple for anger or argument. There was another colour that kept appearing on top of you. I didn't understand it."

"What colour was it?"

"Um, red and pink, it was a very beautiful, soothing blend. I tried to understand what it meant but I don't know . . . "

"Well, I can't be of much help to you but we'll head to the library to see if there are any books that discuss seeing emotions as colours."

"You do realise, Geledriel, that libraries in my world, that is the human world, do not contain such -"

"That's why we are going to my world tonight, Janna."

"Oh."

Both of them felt silent. Janna felt very tired and she yawned, her head slowly falling on Geledriel's shoulder and eyes closed. She was asleep. Her breathing slowed into a rhythmic one, soft and slow as her chest moved up and down. Geledriel sighed heavily and looked up at the sky, wondering about something, quite deeply.
